t: D.C. Law 21-8. Vending Regulations Temporary Amendment Act of 2015.

c.x: The existing text is designated as subsection (a).
A new subsection (b) is added to read as follows:
Section 9 of the Vending Regulation Act of 2009, effective October 22, 2009
This act shall take effect following approval by the Mayor (or in the event
This act shall expire after 225 days of its having taken effect.
